CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Mgmt. Team"), "Mgmt. Team; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Corporate"), "Corporate; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Take-Private"), "Take-Private; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Asset Deal"), "Asset Deal; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Partnership"), "Partnership; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Minority"), "Minority; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Platform"), "Platform; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Project"), "Project; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Structured"), "Structured; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "Add-On"), "Add-On; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type_Infra__c, "TBD"), "TBD; ", NULL) + ".", "; .", NULL)
CustomField.label: Deal Type (Infra)
